text.headline: Trump International Golf Club Lido
text.text:
Founder and Executive Chairman Hary Tanoesoedibjo of MNC Land is launching Trump International Golf Club Lido in 2023.

Ernie Els and golf architect Greg Letsche have designed and built the new 18 hole golf course with Zeon Zoysia fairways and TifEagle greens at 600+ meters elevation above sea level. Long views of Mount Gede, Mount Salak, Mount Pangrango make the ridgetop golf course property in West Java Lido Lakes Resort region most scenic. The Els/Letsche design team are known for their work renovating the Wentworth West Course in England to host the BMW Championship on the DP World Tour.

General Manager Steven Thielke(CCM) has been appointed to open the new golf club. Thielke has past leadership experience as CEO of Sime Darby Propertyâ€™s Leisure Division and at Kuala Lumpur Golf & Country Club (KLGCC), and Singapore Island Country Club.

Address in West Java: Jl. Raya Bogor No.Km 21, Watesjaya, Kec. Cigombong, Kabupaten Bogor, Jawa Barat, Indonesia
